verses.verse: Then sang <WH7891> <WH8799> Mosheh <WH4872> and the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> this song <WH7892> unto the YY <WH3068>, and spake <WH559> <WH8799>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, I will sing <WH7891> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068>, for he hath triumphed <WH1342> <WH8804> gloriously <WH1342> <WH8800>: the horse <WH5483> and his rider <WH7392> <WH8802> hath he thrown <WH7411> <WH8804> into the sea <WH3220>.

The YY <WH3050> is my strength <WH5797> and song <WH2176>, and he is become my salvation <WH3444>: he <WH2088> is my 'Elohim <WH410>, and I will prepare him an habitation <WH5115> <WH8686>; my father's <WH1> 'Elohim <WH430>, and I will exalt <WH7311> <WH8787> him.
The YY <WH3068> is a man <WH376> of war <WH4421>: the YY <WH3068> is his name <WH8034>.

Pharaoh's <WH6547> chariots <WH4818> and his host <WH2428> hath he cast <WH3384> <WH8804> into the sea <WH3220>: his chosen <WH4005> captains <WH7991> also are drowned <WH2883> <WH8795> in the Red <WH5488> sea <WH3220>.
The depths <WH8415> have covered <WH3680> <WH8762> them: they sank <WH3381> <WH8804> into the bottom <WH4688> as <WH3644> a stone <WH68>.

Thy right hand <WH3225>, O YY <WH3068>, is become glorious <WH142> <WH8737> in power <WH3581>: thy right hand <WH3225>, O YY <WH3068>, hath dashed in pieces <WH7492> <WH8799> the enemy <WH341> <WH8802>.

And in the greatness <WH7230> of thine excellency <WH1347> thou hast overthrown <WH2040> <WH8799> them that rose up against <WH6965> <WH8801> thee: thou sentest forth <WH7971> <WH8762> thy wrath <WH2740>, which consumed <WH398> <WH8799> them as stubble <WH7179>.

And with the blast <WH7307> of thy nostrils <WH639> the waters <WH4325> were gathered together <WH6192> <WH8738>, the floods <WH5140> <WH8802> stood upright <WH5324> <WH8738> as an heap <WH5067>, and the depths <WH8415> were congealed <WH7087> <WH8804> in the heart <WH3820> of the sea <WH3220>.

The enemy <WH341> <WH8802> said <WH559> <WH8804>, I will pursue <WH7291> <WH8799>, I will overtake <WH5381> <WH8686>, I will divide <WH2505> <WH8762> the spoil <WH7998>; my lust <WH5315> shall be satisfied <WH4390> <WH8799> upon them; I will draw <WH7324> <WH8686> my sword <WH2719>, my hand <WH3027> shall destroy <WH3423> <WH8686> them.
Thou didst blow <WH5398> <WH8804> with thy wind <WH7307>, the sea <WH3220> covered <WH3680> <WH8765> them: they sank <WH6749> <WH8804> as lead <WH5777> in the mighty <WH117> waters <WH4325>.

Who is like unto thee, O YY <WH3068>, among the 'elohim <WH410>? who is like thee, glorious <WH142> <WH8737> in holiness <WH6944>, fearful <WH3372> <WH8737> in praises <WH8416>, doing <WH6213> <WH8802> wonders <WH6382> ?
Thou stretchedst out <WH5186> <WH8804> thy right hand <WH3225>, the earth <WH776> swallowed <WH1104> <WH8799> them.

Thou in thy mercy <WH2617> hast led forth <WH5148> <WH8804> the people <WH5971> which <WH2098> thou hast redeemed <WH1350> <WH8804>: thou hast guided <WH5095> <WH8765> them in thy strength <WH5797> unto thy holy <WH6944> habitation <WH5116>.
The people <WH5971> shall hear <WH8085> <WH8804>, and be afraid <WH7264> <WH8799>: sorrow <WH2427> shall take hold <WH270> <WH8804> on the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Palestina <WH6429>.

Then <WH227> the dukes <WH441> of Edom <WH123> shall be amazed <WH926> <WH8738>; the mighty men <WH352> of Moab <WH4124>, trembling <WH7461> shall take hold <WH270> <WH8799> upon them; all the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Kanahan <WH3667> shall melt away <WH4127> <WH8738>.

Fear <WH367> and dread <WH6343> shall fall <WH5307> <WH8799> upon them; by the greatness <WH1419> of thine arm <WH2220> they shall be as still <WH1826> <WH8799> as a stone <WH68>; till thy people <WH5971> pass over <WH5674> <WH8799>, O YY <WH3068>, till the people <WH5971> pass over <WH5674> <WH8799>, which <WH2098> thou hast purchased <WH7069> <WH8804>.

Thou shalt bring <WH935> <WH8686> them in, and plant <WH5193> <WH8799> them in the mountain <WH2022> of thine inheritance <WH5159>, in the place <WH4349>, O YY <WH3068>, which thou hast made <WH6466> <WH8804> for thee to dwell in <WH3427> <WH8800>, in the Sanctuary <WH4720>, O YY <WH136>, which thy hands <WH3027> have established <WH3559> <WH8790>.
The YY <WH3068> shall reign <WH4427> <WH8799> for ever <WH5769> and ever <WH5703>.

For the horse <WH5483> of Pharaoh <WH6547> went in <WH935> <WH8804> with his chariots <WH7393> and with his horsemen <WH6571> into the sea <WH3220>, and the YY <WH3068> brought again <WH7725> <WH8686> the waters <WH4325> of the sea <WH3220> upon them; but the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> went <WH1980> <WH8804> on dry <WH3004> land in the midst <WH8432> of the sea <WH3220>.

And Miryam <WH4813> the prophetess <WH5031>, the sister <WH269> of Aharon <WH175>, took <WH3947> <WH8799> a timbrel <WH8596> in her hand <WH3027>; and all the women <WH802> went out <WH3318> <WH8799> after <WH310> her with timbrels <WH8596> and with dances <WH4246>.

And Miryam <WH4813> answered <WH6030> <WH8799> them, Sing <WH7891> <WH8798> ye to the YY <WH3068>, for he hath triumphed <WH1342> <WH8804> gloriously <WH1342> <WH8800>; the horse <WH5483> and his rider <WH7392> <WH8802> hath he thrown <WH7411> <WH8804> into the sea <WH3220>.

So Mosheh <WH4872> brought <WH5265> <WH8686> Yisra'EL <WH3478> from the Red <WH5488> sea <WH3220>, and they went out <WH3318> <WH8799> into the wilderness <WH4057> of Shur <WH7793>; and they went <WH3212> <WH8799> three <WH7969> days <WH3117> in the wilderness <WH4057>, and found <WH4672> <WH8804> no water <WH4325>.

And when they came <WH935> <WH8799> to Marah <WH4785>, they could <WH3201> <WH8804> not drink <WH8354> <WH8800> of the waters <WH4325> of Marah <WH4785>, for they were bitter <WH4751>: therefore the name <WH8034> of it was called <WH7121> <WH8804> Marah <WH4785>.
And the people <WH5971> murmured <WH3885> <WH8735> against Mosheh <WH4872>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, What shall we drink <WH8354> <WH8799> ?

And he cried <WH6817> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068>; and the YY <WH3068> shewed <WH3384> <WH8686> him a tree <WH6086>, which when he had cast <WH7993> <WH8686> into the waters <WH4325>, the waters <WH4325> were made sweet <WH4985> <WH8799>: there he made <WH7760> <WH8804> for them a statute <WH2706> and an ordinance <WH4941>, and there he proved <WH5254> <WH8765> them,

And said <WH559> <WH8799>, If thou wilt diligently <WH8085> <WH8800> hearken <WH8085> <WH8799> to the voice <WH6963> of the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, and wilt do <WH6213> <WH8799> that which is right <WH3477> in his sight <WH5869>, and wilt give ear <WH238> <WH8689> to his Mitzvot <WH4687>, and keep <WH8104> <WH8804> all his statutes <WH2706>, I will put <WH7760> <WH8799> none of these diseases <WH4245> upon thee, which I have brought <WH7760> <WH8804> upon the Egyptians <WH4714>: for I am the YY <WH3068> that healeth <WH7495> <WH8802> thee.

And they came <WH935> <WH8799> to Elim <WH362>, where were twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> wells <WH5869> of water <WH4325>, and threescore and ten <WH7657> palm trees <WH8558>: and they encamped <WH2583> <WH8799> there by the waters <WH4325>.
